title: Mesa Verde National Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions       Alerts    Information        Spruce Tree House Remains Closed  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Spruce Tree House Remains Closed  Due to continued safety concerns relating to rock falls, Spruce Tree House remains closed for the foreseeable future until a full geotechnical assessment can be performed.  Overlooks near the museum offer superb views of the cliff dwelling. more
